data.sql: SELECT distinct column_name FROM all_cons_columns WHERE constraint_name in (SELECT constraint_name FROM all_constraints  WHERE UPPER(table_name) = UPPER('{table_name}') AND CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P')
SELECT distinct * FROM user_col_comments WHERE TABLE_NAME=upper('{table_name}') and COLUMN_NAME = upper('{column_name}')
select * from zj_wfl_instance_para_all_v v  where v.instance_id =  {instance_id}
select * from sys_raise_app_errors where rownum < 10 order by 1 desc
select * from zj_wfl_instance_log t5  where t5.instance_id = {instance_id} order by t5.log_id  desc
select project_id, plan_id from hn_prj_plan_ln l, hn_prj_plan p where l.plan_id = p.plan_id and l.plan_id = {plan_id}
